entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Request] Diagnostic IPC command to dynamically add startup hook at diagnostic startup suspension #83756
  • CoreCLR sample profiling seems expensive #83754
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] SimpleSourceChangeRebuildTest.SimpleStringChangeInSource - Long running test error, cannot access file used by another process #83752
  • Inefficient codegen with struct consisting of 2 SIMD vectors. #83749
  • Add error & status code info to System.Net.Http events #83734
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Reconsider how stress modes are randomly applied #83733
    Future
  • System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.BinaryReadAndWriteTests #83735
  • Could not load file or assembly 'mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0'...... in System.Resources.ResourceManager .NET6.0 #83730
  • JsonConsoleFormatter: (escaped) line breaks of exception stacktraces should be kept #83726
  • Deadlock in the Console.OutputEncoding setter #83723
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndRemove #83738
  • [API Proposal]: GC.RegisterObjectAssociatedMemory #83721
  • [API Proposal]: string System.IO.Path.ToPosixPortable(string) #83718
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on arm64 #83717
    Future
  • .Net 8.0 fails to resolve method in embedded DLL #83753
  • System.Reflection.Emit NuGet has empty `lib` folders for nominally supported frameworks #83710
  • `Buffer.Memmove` has unaligned casts #83709
  • RequiredAttribute does not validate null #83706

Closed

  • Generic struct including itself breaks the runtime - should be a compiler error? #43515
    Future
  • Questions about JsonSerializer.Deserialize #83704
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Floating Point Regression #83739
  • .Net 7-iOS: Why is the interpreter needed in .Net7 but not in Xamarin.iOS? #83442
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->IsCall() || tree->OperIs(GT_COMMA)' during 'Stress gtSplitTree' #83576
    8.0.0
  • [6.0 & 7.0] Unexpectedly uncaught exception in Microsoft.VisualBasic FileSystem GetLongPath #81544
  • Distributed Transaction error/issue with .NET 7 #80777
  • [mono][llvm] Fully support .NET exceptions with LLVM on x64, x86, arm64, arm32 #63404
    8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Support nested EH clauses #54176
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83035
  • Array (single d, double d, and jagged) performance #83719
  • ARM64: Optimize redundant memory loads with mov #35141
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] link static System.Private.CoreLib.dll.a symbol not found #83460
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use an aka.ms link for the breaking change doc issue template #83757
    area-Meta
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [browser] partial reversal of PR #82826 #83750
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [6.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83748
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83747
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Adjust Test Watcher Timeout for Test Collections #83746
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Cache files in simple server #83744
  • [release/7.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83743
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove another reference field from async state machines #83737
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 8.0.0
  • Update owners and fabricbot #83732
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Disable more unsupported runtime tests #83731
  • [release/7.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83728
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [tvOS] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83727
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (3/3) IL Lowering & Outputting #83716
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (2/3) thunk & tramponlie #83715
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (1/3) lp64d ABI #83714
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83713
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • When the aggressive GCCollectionMode is specified, make sure the compacting parameter is set appropriately #83708
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Futher cleanups to delegate invocation #83705
    area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • Avoid losing messages for memory-mapped stress log #81038
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview3] Increment package version for net7 to 7.0.5 #83700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump main pre-release version iteration to preview4 #83691
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] partial reversal of PR #82826 #83637
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter monitoring phase take 2 #83489
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83483
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add some barriers to the delegate invoke code. #83673
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Expand handling of non-value commas in gtSplitTree #83725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete Mono/RuntimeMarshal.cs #83678
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for constant lengths #83638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Load AOT module of a container assembly using assembly name #83711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #83510
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [mono][jit] Add vector horizontal sums and ToScalar on arm64. #83675
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [tvOS] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Adding compare all/any intrinsics. #83515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2140204 #83703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Correct documentation comment for IMultiplyOperators returns #83693
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove calling convention modifiers from cpuid sig #83672
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some HWIntrinsic logic to ensure the right gtType and simdSize are being set #83516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BitOperations::PopCount() in genCountBits() #83661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve RA for LowerBlockStore #83627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: tolerate malformed IL when counting block successors #83676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Eliminate commas early in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Correct formatting of config binder generator #83614
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add Symbolication to XUnitLogChecker #83702
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Reduce size of async state machine by a reference field #83696
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, partner-impact
  • Add LinkerFlavor to NativeAOT #83558
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove EXTRA_*FLAGS. #82516
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • get rid of saved_allocated #77197
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64/X64 - Add `IsVNNeverNegative` #83694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
